name: Two Pillars VR
description:
Ever wanted to jump into a painting? Well now you can! (kind of)

It's not a game but more of an extension of the original painting, now you can surround yourself with the atmosphere and scale of the original painting.
(With additional realtime procedural birds and interactable ball oooh!)



Very much an experiment, let me know what you think, how your experience compares to the original 2d painting and whatnot.
